name: HackSchool: Students, Technology, and Empowerment
blurb: We believe that the true purpose of education is to enable people to create real things that make the world better. Join us!

name: A New Life for an Old School
blurb: The Ville. A local cooperative helping communities learn, share and grow in the spirit of health, wellness and sustainability.

name: ControLeo2 Reflow Oven
blurb: Low-cost, high quality reflow oven for surface-mount PCB assembly at home.  Get professional results consistently and reliably!

name: Arduino, Beaglebone, Raspberry Pi enclosure with LCD, keypad
blurb: An electronics enclosure with HMI ( I2C LCD and keypad) for projects with sensors and relays. 4 Arduino, Beaglebone, Raspberry Pi, MCU

name: Little Free Library Project: Jonesboro, AR
blurb: Our makerspace group wants to make a Little Free Library. Ride, stroll, skate, walk up, then browse, pick a book, maybe leave one too!

name: RPPSOC - System on a Chip for the Raspberry Pi
blurb: System on a chip (SOC) on a Raspberry Pi Hat

name: Iron Range Makerspace (IRM), Ready...Set...Launch!!!
blurb: True economic development comes from putting resources into the hands of the community one is trying to improve

name: Au fil de l'image
blurb: Projet multimédia réalisé par sept étudiants. A travers notre jeu vidéo, vous découvrirez toutes les subtilités de l'image.

name: Help Kids Learn Digital Art Skills with Ms. Computer Teacher
blurb: MsComputerTeacher.com is a website that provides free digital art project tutorials to kids ages 9 and up! Get kids creating!

name: Element4 to innovate
blurb: Un modelo de trabajo para aplicar Design Thinking de forma sencilla y eficaz, en emprendimiento, innovación y gestión del cambio.

name: Smart Greenhouse - Integrating Gardening with Electronics
blurb: An engaging, tangible journey to learn about electronics, sensors and actuators at home through building of a greenhouse model
